import os
# è·å–å½“å‰è·¯å¾„
cur_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__name__))
# è·å–å½“å‰è·¯å¾„â½—â½¬å½•
parent_dir = os.path.dirname(cur_dir)
# å®šä½åˆ°resâ½‚ä»¶å¤¹
find_path = os.path.join(parent_dir, 'res')

while 1:
    find_file_name = input(f"è¯·æç¤ºä½ æƒ³åœ¨{find_path}ä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„æ–‡ä»¶å(qé€€å‡º)\n")
    if find_file_name=='q':
        break

    file_exists=False #è¡¨ç¤ºæ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
    for item in os.listdir(find_path):
        if item==find_file_name:
            file_exists=True
            break

    if file_exists:
        print("æ–‡ä»¶æ‰¾åˆ°")

                                                              # é€’å½’

                                                              è¿™ä¸ªæ˜¯èƒ½æŸ¥åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰çš„ç›®å½•

                                                              # è¿ç»­åœ¨resâ½‚ä»¶å¤¹å†…æŸ¥æ‰¾æŸä¸ªâ½‚ä»¶
import os

# è·å–å½“å‰è·¯å¾„
cur_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__name__))
# è·å–å½“å‰è·¯å¾„â½—â½¬å½•
parent_dir = os.path.dirname(cur_dir)
# å®šä½åˆ°resâ½‚ä»¶å¤¹
find_path, file_path = os.path.join(parent_dir, 'res'), None

while 1:
    find_file_name = input(f"è¯·æç¤ºä½ æƒ³åœ¨{find_path}ä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„æ–‡ä»¶å(qé€€å‡º)\n")
    if find_file_name == 'q':
        break
    file_exists = False  # è¡¨ç¤ºæ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨

    for root, dirs, files in os.walk(find_path):
        for item in files:
            if item == find_file_name:
                file_exists = True
                file_path = os.path.join(root, item)
                break
    if file_exists:
        print("æ–‡ä»¶æ‰¾åˆ°")
    else:
        print("æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°")

                                                              # 3 æ ¹æ®â½‚ä»¶åç¼€åæŸ¥æ‰¾â½‚ä»¶

                                                              #  ç¬¬â¼€ä»¶äº‹æƒ…ï¼Œ os.path.splitext() ä¸­ä¼ â¼Š item ï¼ˆâ½‚ä»¶åæ˜¯ **.&&& ã€‘ï¼‰
#  è¿™æ—¶ï¼Œè¿”å›çš„ç»“æœæ˜¯åˆ—è¡¨ï¼š ["**", ".&&&"]
# [1] è¡¨ç¤ºé€‰æ‹©ä¸Šâ¾¯åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­ï¼Œä¸‹æ ‡ä¸º 1 çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå³é€‰å‡º ".&&&"
#  ç¬¬ä¸‰ä»¶äº‹æƒ…ï¼Œ lower() å‡½æ•°å°† ".&&&" ä¸­çš„â¼¤å†™è‹±â½‚å­—âºŸç»Ÿâ¼€è½¬ä¸ºâ¼©å†™
#  è¿™æ—¶çš„ extension èµ‹å€¼çš„ç»“æœä¸º ".docx" ï¼Œå­—âºŸæ˜¯â¼©å†™
import os
#  è·å–å½“å‰è·¯å¾„
cur_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__name__))
#  è·å–å½“å‰è·¯å¾„â½—â½¬å½•
parent_dir = os.path.dirname(cur_dir)
extension_name = input(f"ä½ æƒ³è¦æŸ¥æ‰¾å“ªå†™åç¼€åâ½‚ä»¶ï¼Œä¸åŒâ½‚ä»¶ç±»å‹é—´â½¤,éš”å¼€ï¼ˆå¦‚xlsx,mp3ç­‰
tmp_extensions = extension_name.split(",")
extensions = ['.' + item for item in tmp_extensions]
found_files_count = 0
for item in os.listdir(os.path.join(parent_dir, 'res')):
extension = os.path.splitext(item)[1].lower()
if extension in extensions:
print(f"ã€æ‰¾åˆ°â½‚ä»¶ã€‘" + item)
found_files_count += 1
print(f"â¼€å…±æœ‰{found_files_count}ä¸ªâ½‚ä»¶")

                                                              # 4 é€’å½’ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°â½‚ä»¶

                                                              import os
import shutil
source_folder_name = input("è¾“â¼Šæƒ³è¦æ“ä½œçš„â½‚ä»¶å¤¹ï¼š")
file_extension = input("è¾“â¼Šæƒ³è¦å¤åˆ¶â½‚ä»¶åç¼€(æ ¼å¼ä¸ºxlsxç­‰)")
target_folder = input("è¾“â¼Šç§»åŠ¨åˆ°â½‚ä»¶å¤¹åç§°")
mv_files = []
for root, folders, files in os.walk(source_folder_name):
for cur_file in files:
if os.path.splitext(cur_file)[1] == '.' + file_extension:
mv_files.append(os.path.join(root, cur_file))
#  å‰ªåˆ‡è¿™äº›â½‚ä»¶
if input('ä½ ç¡®å®šè¦ç§»åŠ¨å—ï¼Ÿ(y/n)') == 'y':
for cp_file in mv_files:
if os.path.exists(os.path.join(target_folder, os.path.basename(cp_file
continue
shutil.move(cp_file, target_folder)
print("Done")

                                                              # 7 æ•´ç†ä¸ºæ¨¡å—

                                                              import os
import shutil
def copy_files(source_folder_name, target_folder, file_extension='xlsx'):
"""
æ‰¹é‡å¤åˆ¶æŒ‡å®šåç¼€åçš„â½‚ä»¶
:param source_folder_name:
:param target_folder:
:param file_extension:
:return:
"""
cp_files = []
for root, folders, files in os.walk(source_folder_name):
for cur_file in files:
if os.path.splitext(cur_file)[1] == '.' + file_extension:
cp_files.append(os.path.join(root, cur_file))
#  å¤åˆ¶è¿™äº›â½‚ä»¶
for cp_file in cp_files:
shutil.copy(cp_file, target_folder)
print("Done")
def delete_files(source_folder_name, file_extension='xlsx'):
"""
æ‰¹é‡åˆ é™¤æŒ‡å®šåç¼€åçš„â½‚ä»¶
:param source_folder_name:
:param file_extension:
:return:
"""
del_files = []
for root, folders, files in os.walk(source_folder_name):
for cur_file in files:
if os.path.splitext(cur_file)[1] == '.' + file_extension:
del_files.append(os.path.join(root, cur_file))
#  åˆ é™¤è¿™äº›â½‚ä»¶
for cp_file in del_files:
os.remove(cp_file)
print("Done")
def move_files(source_folder_name, target_folder, file_extension='xlsx'):
"""
æ‰¹é‡ç§»åŠ¨æŒ‡å®šåç¼€åçš„â½‚ä»¶
:param source_folder_name:
:param target_folder:
:param file_extension:
:return:
"""
mv_files = []
for root, folders, files in os.walk(source_folder_name):
for cur_file in files:
if os.path.splitext(cur_file)[1] == '.' + file_extension:
mv_files.append(os.path.join(root, cur_file))
#  å‰ªåˆ‡è¿™äº›â½‚ä»¶
for cp_file in mv_files:
if os.path.exists(os.path.join(target_folder, os.path.basename(cp_file
continue
shutil.move(cp_file, target_folder)
print("Done")
def walk_to_find(find_path, find_file_name):
"""
è·¯å¾„find_pathä¸­é€’å½’æŸ¥æ‰¾â½‚ä»¶find_file_name
:param find_path:
:param find_file_name:
:return:
"""
result_path = []
for root, dirs, files in os.walk(find_path):
for item in files:
if item == find_file_name:
file_path = os.path.join(root, item)
result_path.append(file_path)
if len(result_path) > 0:
print("æ‰¾åˆ°â½‚ä»¶")
print("\n".join(result_path))
else:
print("â½‚ä»¶æœªæ‰¾åˆ°")
return result_path
def find_extension(find_path, extension_name='xlsx,mp3'):
"""
é€’å½’æŸ¥æ‰¾æŒ‡å®šåç¼€åçš„â½‚ä»¶
:param find_path:
:param extension_name:
:return:
"""
tmp_extensions = extension_name.split(",")
extensions = ['.' + item for item in tmp_extensions]
result_path = []
for cur_dir, folders, files in os.walk(find_path):
for item in files:
extension = os.path.splitext(item)[1].lower()
if extension in extensions:
result_path.append(os.path.join(cur_dir, item))
if len(result_path) > 0:
print("\n".join(result_path))
else:
print("æœªæ‰¾åˆ°")
def stat_file(folder_name):
"""
ç»Ÿè®¡â½‚ä»¶ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œâ½‚ä»¶å¤¹ä¸ªæ•°
:param folder_name:
:return:
"""
file_count, folder_count = 0, 0
if folder_name:
for dir, folders, files in os.walk(folder_name):
file_count += len(files)
folder_count += len(folders)
print(f"{folder_name}â¾¥â¼€å…±åŒ…æ‹¬:{file_count}ä¸ªâ½‚ä»¶, {folder_count}ä¸ªâ½‚ä»¶å¤¹
return file_count, folder_count

                                                              openpyxlæ“ä½œexcelâ½‚ä»¶ openpyxlæ˜¯â½¤äºè¯»å–/å†™â¼ŠExcel 2010 xlsxâ½‚ä»¶çš„Pythonåº“ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´openpyxlè¿™ä¸ªPythonåº“ä¸ â½€æŒxlsâ½‚ä»¶çš„è¯»å–å’Œæ“ä½œã€‚ å¦‚æœåœ¨â¼¯ä½œä¸­é‡åˆ°xlsâ½‚ä»¶ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºxlsxâ½‚ä»¶ã€‚ è¿™ä¸ªåº“æ˜¯â½¬å‰è¯»å†™excelâ½‚ä»¶æ€§èƒ½æœ€å¥½çš„åº“

from excel_office import *
#  è¯»â½‚ä»¶ã€è¯»è¡¨

#  æ‰¾åˆ°â¼¯ä½œè¡¨
worksheet = xlsx_file1['1â½‰é”€å”®è®¢å•æ•°æ®']
sku_sale_dict = {}
#  éå†â¾æ•°æ®
for row_data in worksheet.rows:
sku_name = row_data[2].value #  åˆ—è®¡æ•°ä»é›¶å¼€å§‹
#  è·³è¿‡è¡¨å¤´
if sku_name == "å•†å“å":
continue
sale_n = row_data[7].value
if sku_name in sku_sale_dict:
sku_sale_dict[sku_name] += int(sale_n)
else:
sku_sale_dict[sku_name] = int(sale_n)
print(sku_sale_dict)

                                                              # 2. è¯»å–excelå•å…ƒæ ¼å€¼â½…æ³•2

                                                              import openpyxl
from excel_office import *
#  è¯»â½‚ä»¶ã€è¯»è¡¨
xlsx_file1 = openpyxl.load_workbook(os.path.join(root_dir, 'res', 'æˆ‘çš„xlsx',
#  æ‰¾åˆ°â¼¯ä½œè¡¨

3 æ’â¼Šâ¾
4 æ’â¼Šåˆ—

for row_i in range(2, row_n):
sku_name = worksheet[f'C{row_i}'].value
sale_n = worksheet[f'H{row_i}'].value
if sku_name in sku_sale_dict:
sku_sale_dict[sku_name] += int(sale_n)
else:
sku_sale_dict[sku_name] = int(sale_n)
print(sku_sale_dict)

                                                              # 3æ’â¼Šâ¾

                                                              import openpyxl
from excel_office import *
import string
#  è¯»â½‚ä»¶ã€è¯»è¡¨
xlsx_path = os.path.join(root_dir, 'res', 'æˆ‘çš„xlsx', 'é”€å”®è®¢å•1.0.xlsx')
xlsx_file1 = openpyxl.load_workbook(xlsx_path)
#  æ‰¾åˆ°â¼¯ä½œè¡¨
worksheet = xlsx_file1['1â½‰é”€å”®è®¢å•æ•°æ®']
#  ä»»åŠ¡ï¼šæŠŠä¸‹â¾¯è¿™â¾æ•°æ®æ’â¼Šåˆ°ç¬¬ 10 â¾
insert_data = ['99232019010124', '700014', 'æœ‰ç‚¹é…¸å¯ä¹', 'å›å†æ¥ç‰Œ', 'é¥®æ–™', '550
inserted_at = 10
#  æ±‚è§£ä»£ç 
#  ç¬¬â¼€æ­¥ï¼šæ’â¼Šâ¼€â¾
worksheet.insert_rows(10)
#  ç¬¬â¼†æ­¥ï¼šä¸ºæ­¤â¾æ’â¼Šå•å…ƒæ ¼æ•°æ®
columns_n = worksheet.max_column # max_row
columns = list(string.ascii_uppercase)[:columns_n]
for i, col_i in enumerate(columns):
worksheet[f'{col_i}10'] = insert_data[i]
#  ç¬¬ä¸‰æ­¥ï¼šä¿å­˜æ•°æ®
xlsx_file1.save(xlsx_path)

                                                              # 4.æ’â¼Šåˆ—

                                                              import openpyxl
from excel_office import *
import random
#  è¯»â½‚ä»¶ã€è¯»è¡¨
xlsx_path = os.path.join(root_dir, 'res', 'æˆ‘çš„xlsx', 'é”€å”®è®¢å•1.0.xlsx')
xlsx_file1 = openpyxl.load_workbook(xlsx_path)
#  æ‰¾åˆ°â¼¯ä½œè¡¨
worksheet = xlsx_file1['1â½‰é”€å”®è®¢å•æ•°æ®']
#  ä»»åŠ¡ï¼šåœ¨å€’æ•°ç¬¬â¼†åˆ—å‰æ’â¼Š 3 åˆ—
#  å¹¶èµ·åä¸º :  æ–°å¢åˆ— 1 ï¼Œæ–°å¢åˆ— 2 ï¼Œæ–°å¢åˆ— 3
#  æœ€åéšæœºå¡«å…… [1,100] çš„éšæœºæ•´æ•°

import math
import openpyxl
from excel_office import *
import os

#  ç¬¬â¼€æ­¥ï¼šåˆ›å»ºåˆå¹¶ç»“æœâ½‚ä»¶ï¼šé”€å”®è®¢å•å…¨éƒ¨åˆå¹¶ç»“æœ .xlsx

result_wb = openpyxl.Workbook()
result_ws = result_wb.active
result_ws.title = "æ±‡æ€»sheet"
summary_ws = result_wb.create_sheet("ç»Ÿè®¡sheet")
result_wb.save(save_path)

7 ä»‹ç»â¾ƒåŠ¨æ“ä½œwordåŒ…åŠå®‰è£…

â½‡å¸¸éœ€è¦ç»å¸¸å¤„ç†Wordâ½‚æ¡£ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªåŒ…å’ŒpandasåŒ…ç»“åˆä½¿â½¤ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨wordæ’â¼Šexcelè¡¨æ ¼ï¼Œèƒ½èŠ‚çœ

merge_row_index = 0
has_header = False
for xls_file in os.listdir(dir_path):
if xls_file == 'é”€å”®è®¢å•1.0.xlsx' or os.path.splitext(xls_file)[1] != '.xls
continue
xls_sheets = openpyxl.load_workbook(os.path.join(dir_path, xls_file))
sale_sheet = xls_sheets.worksheets[1]
mr = sale_sheet.max_row
mc = sale_sheet.max_column
for i in range(1, mr + 1):
if has_header and i == 1: #  åˆå¹¶å¤šä¸ª excel åªå–ç¬¬â¼€ä¸ª excel åˆ—å¤´
continue
merge_row_index += 1
for j in range(1, mc + 1):
result_ws.cell(merge_row_index, j).value = sale_sheet.cell(i, j).v
has_header = True
#  ç¬¬ä¸‰æ­¥ï¼šåˆ†æ æ±‡æ€» sheet  ï¼Œç»Ÿè®¡å‡ºå•†å“å’Œé”€é‡çš„å­—å…¸
sku_sale_dict = {}
row_n = result_ws.max_row
for row_i in range(2, row_n):
sku_name = result_ws[f'C{row_i}'].value
sale_n = result_ws[f'H{row_i}'].value
if math.isnan(sale_n):
continue
if sku_name in sku_sale_dict:
sku_sale_dict[sku_name] += int(sale_n)
else:
sku_sale_dict[sku_name] = int(sale_n)
#  ç¬¬å››æ­¥ï¼šå†™â¼Š ç»Ÿè®¡ sheet  ä¸­
#  åˆ—å¤´
summary_ws.cell(1, 1).value = "å•†å“å"
summary_ws.cell(1, 2).value = "æ€»é”€é‡"
stat_row_n = 2
for key, value in sku_sale_dict.items():
summary_ws.cell(stat_row_n, 1).value = key
summary_ws.cell(stat_row_n, 2).value = value
stat_row_n += 1
#  ç¬¬äº”æ­¥ï¼šä¿å­˜
result_wb.save(save_path)

'1994å¹´1â½‰ï¼ŒPython 1.0æ­£å¼å‘å¸ƒ', style='List Bullet'
)

'2000å¹´10â½‰ï¼šPython 2.0å‘å¸ƒ', style='List Bullet'
)

'2008å¹´12â½‰ï¼šPython 3.0å‘å¸ƒ', style='List Bullet'

hdr_cells[2].text = 'å¾—åˆ†'
records = (
(1, 'C++', '8'),
(2, 'Python', '9'),
(3, 'Java', '8.1')
)

for shape in slide.shapes:

                                                              import pdfplumber
from pdf import *
pdf_path = os.path.join(root_dir, 'res', 'æˆ‘çš„pdf', 'pdf_folder')
#  éå† pdf â½‚ä»¶
pdf_list = os.listdir(pdf_path)
#  é€ä¸ªéå† pdf â½‚æ¡£
for pdf_file in pdf_list:
if os.path.splitext(pdf_file)[1] != ".pdf":
continue
#  ç»„è£…å®Œæ•´è·¯å¾„
pdf_file_path = os.path.join(pdf_path, pdf_file)
#  è¯»å– pdf â½‚ä»¶
pdf = pdfplumber.open(pdf_file_path) #  å…³é”®ä»£ç  1
#  é€â»šéå†
for page in pdf.pages: #  å…³é”®ä»£ç  2
text_data = page.extract_text() #  å…³é”®ä»£ç  3
print(text_data)
#  å®Œæˆâ¼€â»šçš„æ·»åŠ 
print(f"{pdf_file}æå–å®Œæˆ")

                                                              import docx
import pdfplumber
import pptx
from pptx import Presentation
from pptx.util import Inches
from pdf import *
#  é…ç½®å‚æ•°
# pdf åå•
pdf_path = os.path.join(root_dir, 'res', 'æˆ‘çš„pdf', 'åå•.pdf')
#  ä¼˜ç§€æ•™å¸ˆåå•
ppt_file = "ä¼˜ç§€æ•™å¸ˆ.pptx"
#  åå•
name_list = []
#  æ·»åŠ åˆ° ppt â½‚æ¡£ä¸­
prs = Presentation()
slide_layout = prs.slide_layouts[5]
#  æ‰“å¼€ pdf â½‚æ¡£
pdf_content = pdfplumber.open(pdf_path)
#  é€â»šéå†â½‚æ¡£â»šâ¾¯ï¼Œå–è¡¨æ ¼
#  ç¬¬â¼€â»šæœ‰è¡¨å¤´ï¼Œç‰¹æ®Šæƒ…å†µç‰¹æ®Šå¤„ç†
if len(pdf_content.pages) > 0:
all_tables = []
headers = pdf_content.pages[0].extract_tables()[0][0]
rows_page = 8
for page_content in pdf_content.pages:
#  å–è¡¨
cur_table = page_content.extract_tables()[0]
all_tables.extend(cur_table)
#  æ¯ 8 â¾ä¿å­˜â¼€â»š PPT
all_tables = all_tables[1:] # all_tables[0] æ˜¯åˆ—å¤´
for row in range(len(all_tables)):
if row % rows_page == 0:
#  å®ä¾‹åŒ– table  å¯¹è±¡
slide = prs.slides.add_slide(slide_layout)
left = top = Inches(2) #  è¡¨æ ¼èµ·å§‹ä½ç½®
24 æ‰¹é‡åˆå¹¶pdfâ½‚æ¡£å¹¶ä¿å­˜ä¸ºword
width = Inches(6.0) #  å®½
height = Inches(1.0) #  â¾¼
table_shape = slide.shapes.add_table(rows_page + 1, len(cur_table
for j in range(len(cur_table[0])):
table_shape.table.cell(row % rows_page, j).text = headers[j]
for col in range(len(all_tables[0])):
#  å•å…ƒæ ¼å¤„ç†
table_shape.table.cell(row % rows_page + 1, col).text = all_tables
#  ä¿å­˜
prs.save(ppt_file)

                                                              # 22 æ‰¹é‡åˆå¹¶pdfâ½‚æ¡£å¹¶ä¿å­˜ä¸ºword

                                                              import docx
import pdfplumber
from pdf import *
pdf_path = os.path.join(root_dir, 'res', 'pdf', 'pdf_folder')
#  éå† pdf â½‚ä»¶
pdf_list = os.listdir(pdf_path)
#  æ–°å»ºå­˜å‚¨â½¤çš„ Word â½‚æ¡£
new_doc = docx.Document()
#  é€ä¸ªéå† pdf â½‚æ¡£
for pdf_file in pdf_list:
if os.path.splitext(pdf_file)[1] != ".pdf":
continue
#  ç»„è£…å®Œæ•´è·¯å¾„
pdf_file_path = os.path.join(pdf_path, pdf_file)
#  è¯»å– pdf â½‚ä»¶
pdf = pdfplumber.open(pdf_file_path) #  å…³é”®ä»£ç  1
#  é€â»šéå†
for page in pdf.pages: #  å…³é”®ä»£ç  2
text_data = page.extract_text() #  å…³é”®ä»£ç  3
print(text_data)
new_doc.add_paragraph(text_data)
#  æ·»åŠ åˆ†â»š
new_doc.add_page_break()
#  å®Œæˆâ¼€â»šçš„æ·»åŠ 
print(f"{pdf_file}æå–å®Œæˆ")
new_doc.save("åˆå¹¶å¤šä¸ªpdfä¸º1ä¸ªword.docx")
